---
title: "Change dates for extractions"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
params: 
  type: "extraction"
  id: "extraction_id"
  db: "Laboratory"
  
---

Access database.
```{r workspace, echo = F, message=FALSE}
source("../genomics/scripts/lab_helpers.R")
write <- write_db(params$db)
library(knitr)

# pull in entire db table
db <- read_db(params$db)
dat <- db %>% tbl(params$type) %>% collect()
```
Find the range of rows to be changed
```{r change}
# change plate names
change <- dat %>%
  filter(plate == "E5223-E5306" | 
         plate == "E5127-E5222") %>% 
  mutate(date = "2018-07-27")
  
dat <- change_rows(dat, change, params$id)

```
Write to database

# dbDisconnect(write)
